verbs.description: [ARG0: rockland town] [ARG0: official] [V: demands] [ARG1: 5 million to settle sex scandal] rockland town administrator allan chiocca said he wants more than 5 million to abandon any potential lawsuits against the town and former selectmen deidre hall and edward kimball over the town hall sex scandal attorney supervisor john clifford sex llp deidre hall tortious interference scandal harassment sue hall rockland massachusetts edward kimball rockland new york administrator 5 million chris kenny boston 25 news rockland adam shafran allan chiocca town malicious prosecution investigator official selectwoman mass
